@NiggaPoopToilet There are things we like and we dislike, and some things we love or hate. One of them is being is NTR (I'm here to see if there are vanillafags crying about NTR here for entertainment, but then I saw you), because I'm not a fan of it, I have my reasons, mainly being the idea of cucking some dude, But when you said about self-insertion of the cuck or the "chad", I definitely agree with that. I can see how people can get off to NTR, but its not my cup of tea. The big problem with both with NTR fans/cucks or vanillafags is that they are extremely too vocal with their ideas. Like its annoying to see some NTR fan in an extremely and fluffy vanilla hentai saying "NTR CHAPTER WHEN???? I HOPE MC GETS CUCKED HAHAHAHA" and then there are vanillafags downright shaming NTR fans/cucks, and vice versa. I may be a vanilla fan, but then I do agree some vanilla are bland, but they can be enjoyable for me.

Because there are some VERY tasty ladies in their 30s, 40s and even beyond that. But 30s to early 40s is primetime for MILFs!!  Which is nothing compared to going that low on the age scale. Seriously if you're attracted to 12-year olds and you're not around 12 yourself, get help. Although the BF is invisible here, it's a typical NTR scenario: women are just sex toys, here, fantasize about taking a woman away from someone who has a girlfriend to make your sexless life feel better. But the concept is just plain dumb.  MC is such a boss, why's he not boning his own woman? What would be fun? Some  Unique NTR stories on the other hand will leave me speechless. For example, 353877. Start on page 95. That outcome will have you at a loss for words

Everybody keep saying ntr is supposed to be self-insert. Really? Never have I once done that or even wanted to think of doing that in any doujin that I read. I just enjoy it for the art, that's all. Am I the only one that doesn't self-insert themself in any hentai?

@Aldyn I don't mind and I understand I mean it makes sense that it's for self-insertion a power fantasy for some ("alpha males") and kink for others (cucks). But since I never read that way at least not anymore I never get those type of feels. For me I focus on the story beats if the plot sucks which most of the time they do imo I won't care for it and just pay attention to the sex scenes and the erotic parts of it while just laughing off the story because if the artist's not going to put in the effort in writing then why should I care so I treat it as a comedy of sorts. ayo man yall gotta try this sauce out bro  == 294298

@Aldyn I had that mindset before and wrote a comment similar to that a while ago. The problem is the circular argument fallacy. Look how I addressed the argument of self inserting as the bull. HOWEVER, the difference with netori is that there is no factor to self insert as the cuckold such as in regular NTR. Netori doesn’t give you the feeling of empathy for the cuck. I truly enjoy it because I find it immoral enough to get me off, but not too immoral to the point where it’d make me have post nut clarity.

@Sumo so my opinion on the self insertion aspect; it is also invalid as an argument and let me state why from both perspectives. An NTR stan would most likely say something like “fucking pathetic. You insert yourself as the cuckold and wonder and then get like a retard when you get called a cuck.” A Vanilla stan would probably say something like “How fucking pathetic do you have to be to insert yourself as a depiction of an “alpha male” for self satisfaction? You try your hardest to be the alpha male but in real life you couldn’t even speak to a woman irl.” See where this is going? It’s a circular argument that has no end. Arguing about Self-insertion will lead to know outcome.

@Sumo Don't mind me barging into the conversation, but NTR is inherently made for people to self-insert as the cuck or just enjoy it as an uninvolved third party. That's common sense within the JP art community. Netori exists for people to self-insert as the chad. People who say that they read NETORARE to self-insert as the one doing the cucking are just insecure fags in denial, and it's mostly westerners who do that.

@Sumo I can most definitely say that we’re on the same wavelength, and as for arguments, I say they’re blatantly invalid. Saying it’s just fiction won’t change the perspective for most people. For example, when someone says it’s just fiction, not only is it fiction, it’s a depiction of that real thing. So if I don’t enjoy seeing shit being splattered in real life, why in the hell would I enjoy seeing it in a doujin? There’s a certain fallacy name for this argument but if forgot the name of it.
That being said, if u know some good ugly bastard stuff pls do give recommendations (though I’ve read most of those) :)

lets gooo, goated shit

@softouch Agreeable. You see, I’m not going to bullshit you. I don’t like Vanilla. I find MOST to be bland but I most definitely do make exceptions and will still get off to it. I also don’t fancy regular NTR myself, but I still enjoy it. Feeling down or just disgusted in yourself happens to almost everyone. The reason it’s called post nut clarity is because after you’ve satisfied yourself your sense of regular morality hits you with a lead left hook.

I’m ok with most NTR. But once in awhile some artists will draw one that really messes me up after reading it. I’ll feel down even though it doesn’t happen irl. I’ll go read a few vanilla dojin afterwards to calm myself down. Do i love NTR? No, I don’t. But it’s more exciting than your usual hentai. So i like reading it, as long as it doesn’t mess with me too much. Generic NTR is fine for me lol

@Magimous exactly, it is MORE exciting. Going back to immorality, the more immoral something is, the more exciting it tends to be. Once you experience the arousing pleasure you get, it’d be harder to enjoy les immoral things, which is why NTR stans most likely won’t enjoy vanilla doujins. And the thing is, people DO tend to let fiction get to them. Remember that self insertion I said? Some will insert themselves as the cuckold and feel horrible while others will insert themselves as the alpha to receive satisfaction. Both sides will criticize each other for this. Another reason as to why they hate each other.

People like freaky stuff. NTR tag exist because it's somewhat more "exciting" than normal doujins. It's like watching a horror movie... Just don't let fiction affect you too much. There's no need to be awfully invested in a fictional character that will only last for about 30 pages.

P.2 Now this is where the strife and hate comes from. Moral codes are what keeps us humane you could say. When others don’t agree with another’s  moral code, one would be quick to criticize. This is a normal occurrence. For an example, I myself am into Netori, because I don’t find it too immoral to be disgusted in. However, I can’t stand Netorase, and I’ve criticized countless people who beg to differ. Its simply a normal human action. I myself notice when something passes my moral code, it is no different then some of the worse immoral things. Another example is me seeing Netori no different than gore; I find them to be both trifiling. And as I said, other will most definitely disagree because we are all unique. With this being said, I believe that there will never be a moment where NTR stans and Vanilla stans will be eye to eye with each other. Moral code simply won’t allow it. I’m willing to debate with anyone. I love having a good, civil debate 👍🏾

P.1 That’s a good question @Ecchinosuke. Speaking on a similar note, I believe I’ve found the reasoning as to why there is a rift on to the people who love and hate hate NTR. Take heed, because this will be rather long and I’m going to enter my philosophy phase. Now, everyone knows that those who hate NTR sees others who like it as, should I say, cuckolds who self-insert themselves into doujins; this being vice versa. However, this is not truly the case. Looking past that enjoying NTR and disliking it is based off of subdivisions of two principles; Morality & Immortality. Now, I find it natural to be aroused from things that are rather immoral. I believe MOSTLY everyone does also. However, there’s when moral code comes in. The line between what is deemed too immoral to be arousing. Everyone’s moral code differs, although than can be quite similar. When it all comes down to it, people who have a less strict moral code will enjoy NTR, while this is the opposite for others.
